eu_initiatives: Alternative Dispute Resolution within both the commercial and consumer areas.
membership: We are a member of the Civil Mediation Council (England & Wales).
relevant_communication: Contributing to, and general monitoring of, emerging EU thinking and practice in relation to the fields of Alternative Dispute Resolution, effective conflict management and negotiation.
legal_status: UK Registered charity; company limited by guarantee
goals__remit:
CEDR is a not-for-profit organisation and independent service provider, founded 1990, that innovates and campaigns for better and faster resolution of disputes and promotes negotiation expertise. 
 
CEDR’s ground-breaking initiatives raise awareness of the need for more effective leadership – in collaboration and dialogue – and of how to achieve it. 
 
We are the world’s leading dispute resolution and conflict management consultancy.
